item.title: Noveny Onion Seed Cold-Pressed Oil
item.dc:creator: smartcoders
item.description:
Noveny Onion Seed Cold-Pressed Oil, 100% Pure & Natural For Skin Care, Hair Care, Cold & Cough and Insect Repellent (15ml, 30ml, 120ml)

  1. HAIR CARE: Onion seed Oil nourishes and stimulates scalp and helps in encouraging the growth of new hair. Mix 3 drops of onion seed oil in 10 ml of coconut or olive, and apply on scalp and massage.
  2. NOURISHES THE SKIN: Onion Seed Oil keeps the skin healthy and fresh and clears the face off acne and fungus, making s fresh and pretty. Add 3 drops of onion seed oil to 2 tbsp of carrier oil and massage on skin and face helps increase blood circulation and improves the overall appearance of your skin.
  3. FOR COLD & COUGH: Onion seed oil is useful in clearing the throat and the nasal tract of the mucus and congestion. Apply 5 drops of onion seed oil on chest and rub if suffering from cold.
  4. HEALS WOUNDS: Onion seed oil has anti-bacterial and anti-fungal properties that help to heal wounds. Apply 3 drops of onion seed oil on wound so as to cure infection and heal wounds.
  5. USE AS A INSECT REPELLENT: Onion Seed oil is the best used as a insect repellent as well as a form of sting treatment. Apply 5 drops of onion seed oil on open skin areas so as to reduce the pain caused from honeybee stings and insect bites.
  6. CONTROL BLOOD SUGAR LEVELS: Adding 2 drops of onion seed oil to food helps in controlling blood sugar levels.
  7. Cold Pressed process retains all the goodness as the extraction process does not use heat or harmful chemicals.

The post Noveny Onion Seed Cold-Pressed Oil appeared first on Noveny life.
